issue.title: [CF 460] Let alpha only effect textures, not entire icon
issue.body:
Do you think you could make it so the opacity of an animation attached to a metaicon doesn't change with the icon the metaicon is currently displaying?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #460 | Raw

comments.body:
There isn't any way to do this that I can think of that would work elegantly and wouldn't require all sorts of special handling and configuration overload for users, so I'm just going to let this one die.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
